title: UAT feedback: Modify rule 1.12 and 2.06. Only run it if amount is higher than $800,000
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is a trade between two or more orgs
AND that org has already received a cash payment of 800,000 or more in the past 6 months
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters a cash payment of 800,000 or more and the "To" org is the org mentioned in the preconditions
custom_expected:
THEN Show the BOC approval checkbox.
AND if the counts as a required field

title: As a user I want to see a spinner when a widget is retrieving additional data
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Addendum C widget
AND rapidly scrolls down the widget past records that are currently loaded in the widget
custom_expected: THEN the widget shows a spinning icon until it has loaded all the records

title: Select All in widgets selects All rows
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a widget with more than 400 results (for example, 2000)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the "select all" box
custom_expected:
THEN the widget footer will read "400 of 2000 entries selected - select all 2000" with "select all 2000" being a blue link.
AND scrolling down and selecting additional entries will update this total
AND clicking "select all X" in the footer selects all x entries
AND the footer reads "X of X entries selected"

title: As a user, I want the Current MJ Acquisition Date to get updated on a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that an org has started a trade of an MJ player to an MJ org
custom_steps:
WHEN the trade is Approved
AND that trade is then Reversed
custom_expected:
THEN populate the "Current Maj Lg Aquisition" field on the Info tab of the Player Profile with the Org, date of the move and where they came from
AND this field is updated on Approve 
AND this field is reverted on Reverse

title: As a developer, I want to ensure that Trades and International Signing Bonus utility work between ebis 1 and ebis 2 - Bridge Work -- Unstarted** 12/16
custom_steps:
Note: International Signing Bonus utility is likely to remain behind in ebis 1 so we need to ensure that trades are set up correctly to handle bridged data between 1 and 2

**Reference:**
International signing bonus rules:
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1735522?projectId=14044

**AC**
- After this all subsequent changes to this table will be handled by Trades in Ebis 2 and the updated values are sent back to EBIS 1 on a daily basis for the Intl Signing Bonus Utility.
- When trading a slot value, the club sees an up-to-date list of the current values that can be traded. These include any adjustments made to the value or if the slot is owned by a different club - both of which can result through a trade.
- Additionally, on a daily basis, Ebis 1 needs to send the "Total Signing Bonuses" for each club to Ebis 2 so that rule checks can be run in ebis 2 for Trades and Contracts.

**Bridging summary**
Daily 1 to 2 etl - Bring over "Total Signing Bonuses" value for each club
Daily 2 to 1etl - Send back any slot trades and slot value adjustments

The daily bridge portion is on the DB team's radar in the following google doc - 
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XnenuPrjzAEbx9SchP2yFdiLqDk-NSWXbJupM-EYwUU/edit#gid=0

title: As a club/BOC, I can view Outright to Mx Lg transactions from ebis 1 in ebis 2
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is an OTML created in Ebis1 (e.g. https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/transaction?txId=10872147&playerId=373061)
custom_steps:
WHEN user searches for the trade in Ebis 2
AND when user views the profile history of an involved player
custom_expected:
THEN it is available in the search results
AND it is available in the player history widgets
AND all the data is correctly populated in Ebis2

title: As a club/BOC, I can see rule checks when I submit an outright to mex lg tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has created a preliminary OTML
custom_steps: WHEN user submits an OTML
custom_expected:
THEN the OnSubmit rule checks are run on the transaction: Rules - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2351678?projectId=14044
AND required field checks are run
AND file attachment rule checks are run (see #129712017 in references)
AND they are run if BOC is submitting on behalf of club with appropriate overrides

title: As BOC, I can approve an Outright to Mx Lg Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND user is viewing a Submitted to BOC OTML
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Run the applicable OnSubmit rule checks but with overrides for BOC
AND the state change buttons appears as listed in https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2281404?projectId=14044
AND Transaction is no longer editable for BOC with the exception of fields mentioned in #129708081
AND Status and Dates section is updated.
AND Blue notification is generated
AND Reload page after state change
AND Player's Pending Org (MEX) and Pending Club should become his current Org and club

title: As a club, I can only view limited sections of the OTML
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is an approved OTML involving club X
AND there is a preliminary OTML involving X
AND there is a Submitted to BOC OTML involving X
AND each OTML contains a conditional cash consideration
AND each OTML contains a regular cash consideration
custom_steps:
WHEN user logs in as club X
AND user logs in as club Y
custom_expected:
THEN All Clubs can see all approved OTMLs
AND club X and Y cannot see Conditional Cash Considerations even if they are part of the trade
AND Only club X can see the Cash Considerations.
AND OTMLs trades not yet approved can only be viewed by club X
AND Attached files and Comments can only be viewed by club X
AND BOC Notes cannot be viewed by clubs X or Y

title: As BOC, I can reverse, reject or suppress an Outright to MX lg transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is an OTML that is Submitted to BOC
AND an approved OTML
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC clicks reject on the Submitted OTML
AND clicks reverse on the Approved OTML
AND then clicks suppress on the Reversed OTML
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can reject the submitted OTML. This will reverse any updates made to the trade/players when it was submitted to BOC
AND Club gets a rejection notification and can update and resubmit the transaction to BOC
AND BOC can reverse the approved OTML. This will reverse all approval updates and change the transaction status to Reversed
AND BOC can suppress the reversed transaction,  this will hide it for the club in all widgets and searches (player history, advanced search, notifications)

title: As club/BOC, I can add PTBNL considerations to an OTML transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing an OTML
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add Consideration under the MLB org
custom_expected:
THEN they can add a Player to be Named Later consideration
AND this option is not available for the Mex orrg
AND this consideration behaves the same as on trades, except it does not have a pay schedule button
AND the "To" club is limited to Mex clubs that are already receiving a regular player in this outright.

title: As a club/BOC, I can name a player to be named later for an Outright to Mexican League
custom_steps:
**AC**
- This functionality should work the same as naming a player for an Outright Trade
- The dropdown to pick the player should be limited to Minor league players only
- AC in the following stories should apply (except MJ only logic) #129472041, #129954263, #129472093, #129472863
- There is no club approval process. Submitted named players go straight to BOC for approval.
- Player's pending Org/Club gets updated on Submit and current org/club gets updated on approval
- Repeat the following on Submit rule checks on applicable state changes
2.03 - #126261273
2.18 - #126526871
2.17 - #126431981
2.19.1 - #134040745
2.19 - #126534133
2.52 - #129463339 - approval only
2.51 #129463299 - approval only

title: As a club, I want to print a Life insurance form for each player in the Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a trade
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print next to a player
custom_expected: THEN the user can print a Life Insurance form

title: As a club, I want to print a Life insurance form for each player in the Trade in Spanish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a trade involving a Spanish-speaking player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print next to that player
custom_expected: THEN the user can print a Life Insurance form in Spanish

title: As a Club, I want to print an Assignment Agreement for the trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a trade
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print at the bottom of the trade form
custom_expected:
THEN the Assignment Agreement can be printed
AND If more than 2 clubs are involved, list all clubs on the same AA. For example, if there were 3 clubs involved, the opening para would say ...between the Oakland Athletics, Chicago Whitesox and New York Mets."
AND each club involved has their own signature section with a maximum of 2 signature blocks side-by-side
AND the signature section has the name of the authorized signatory populated on the appropriate line

title: As a club, I want to print an Assignment Agreement for a PTBNL
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing a trade
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks print at the bottom of the form
AND selects Assignment Agreement
custom_expected:
THEN The Assignment Agreement form for the named player can be printed from the PRINT button on the named player row. There is one for each named player.
AND The AA can be printed at any state in the stateflow including post approval

title: As a club, I can print an Assignment Agreement for Outright to mexican league
custom_steps: See previous test case

title: As a Club, I want to print the Trades Checklist  with mandatory checklist items
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing an MJ trade
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits print and chooses Checklist
custom_expected:
THEN open a PDF of the Trade Checklist in a new tab
AND this option Only appears on Major League trades
AND The Trade checklist has some checklist items that are displayed always, while other checklist items are conditional. For this story, generate a PDF with the mandatory checklist items. Refer to the item-by-item requirements for text to display and order
- Deferred Compensation section
- Medical Info section
- Negotiate Extension section
- Verify Entry section
- Life insurance section

title: As a club, I want a checklist item to agree on alt cash amount if players are to be named later
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps:
WHEN the user adds a player to be named later section to the trade
AND prints the trade checklist
custom_expected:
THEN add the "Players to be named later" checklist item
AND  shows the alternate cash consideration amount

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if any of the traded players require Trade waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN there is a player that requires trade waivers
custom_expected: THEN add the "Trade Waivers"  checklist item if the conditions are met.

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if player was a recent draft selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes a player drafted in the most recent domestic amateur draft
custom_expected: THEN print the R4 draft pick checklist item

title: As a club, I want a checklist item to contact LRD if a CB Lottery draft pick will be traded
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes a lottery draft pick
custom_expected: THEN include the CBB draft pick checklist item

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if an Intl signing bonus slot will be traded
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes an international signing bonus slot
custom_expected: THEN include the Int'l signing bonus slot checklist item

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if a traded player has miscellaneous clauses and covenants in his major contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes MJ players with a "miscellaneous clauses and covenants" flag
custom_expected: THEN include the miscellaneous clauses and covenants checklist item

title: As a club, I want a checklist item to get written consent if a recently signed FA is being traded prior to June 16
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes a player that requires consent for being a recent XXB free agent
custom_expected: THEN include the free agent checklist item

title: As a Club, I want to print a Notice of Disposition for each player in the Trade in English
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is viewing a trade form with at least one player
AND org from which those players are coming has an authorized signatory selected,
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the print button next to a player in the player consideration table
custom_expected:
THEN print a notice of disposition for that player
AND include the club's authorized signatory

title: As a Club, I want to print a Notice of Disposition for each player in the Trade in Spanish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is following the steps in the previous test case
AND the player has a spoken language of "Spanish" selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user prints the form
custom_expected: THEN the Spanish version of the form prints

title: As Club, I can print a Notice of Disposition for a player outrighted to Mexican League
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is viewing an Outright to Mexican league transaction
AND the user is otherwise following the steps from the previous test case
custom_steps: WHEN the user prints the form
custom_expected:
THEN the form prints as follows:

English:
This disposition notice is to advise you that your contract has been assigned outright to the roster of the [Mex club full name] Club of the Mexican League.

Spanish:
Este aviso de disposiciÃ³n tiene por objeto notificarle que su contrato ha sido asignado directamente de la alineaciÃ³n del Club  [Mex club full name] de la Liga Mexicana.

title: As a Club,  I want to name a player post-trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is a club that is receiving a Player to be named consideration in a trade
AND that trade is approved
custom_steps:
WHEN the receiving club logs in and views the trade
AND they switch the trade to edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN they can view the "Name player" button
AND If there were multiple PTBNL from the same Org, they see a Name player button for each player
AND When club selects the "Name player" option, the club can select a player. The player section fields work the same as when adding a player under Player consideration. Written consent, print/upload, Add C and Special covenant flag logic should apply
AND The "From club" field is locked and shows the player's current affiliate. Pos and Roster status autoANDpopulate
AND If the player is Minor league, the "To club" field is editable so the user can select the Minor league affiliate.
AND If player is MJ league, the "To Club" is locked since the player can only move to the MJ roster.
AND Club can delete the player and name a different player
AND Once a player is picked, the 'Submit to Club' button appears and is blue. The "Name player" button disables itself.
AND Selecting 'Submit to club' will move the PTBNL transaction to 'Submitted to Club' Status. Blue notification appears and page reloads with neither button. The PTBNL is no longer editable by club
AND BOC can perform this action on behalf of any club

title: As a club, I want to see rule checks on named player
custom_steps: WHEN club submits a named player
custom_expected: THEN run the following rule checks: [On-Submit rules](http://10.199.1.138/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/12013&group_by=cases:section_id&group_id=71889&group_order=asc)

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if I name a player after the agreed on deadline to name him
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing an approved trade with a preliminary Player to be named later consideration
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Name Player 
AND sets the date of the PTBNL is after the "Player must be named before" date on the PTBNL consideration
AND the user submits the player to named, run rule checks
custom_expected:
THEN show a hard error for the club
AND show a warning for the BOC

title: As a club, I want to reject a named player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a club
AND the user is viewing a trade with a submitted PTBNL
AND they are the receiving club
custom_steps: WHEN the club hits the 'Reject' button on the PTBNL
custom_expected:
THEN This updates the transaction status to "Rejected"
AND Page reloads for rejecting club with no buttons
AND Action item is cleared from approving club's clipboard.
AND The initiating Club gets a notification with Description = Player to be Named Later  is rejected by [Org]
AND The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees the option to delete the named player and add a different player and re-submit

title: As a Club, I want to approve a named player post-trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a PTBNL transaction has been submitted to a club
custom_steps: WHEN the receiving club logs in and views the clipboard widget
custom_expected:
THEN  the club that the player is going to receives as action item. (Note that any other participating clubs do not get the action item)
AND The Action item has type = Transaction and Description = "Player to be Named submitted to Club by [Org 3 letter abbreviation]." AND It also shows the player name and date/time
AND Club can click on the Action item to open the Trade. They see a 'Submit to BOC' blue button and a grey Reject button under the PTBNL. 
AND Approving club can edit the trade to add forms for the player and update the Received insurance form date. They cannot edit any of the player details or change the player.
AND Run attach file rule checks on Save
AND If Club hits Submit to BOC, the PTBNL transaction gets updated to Submitted to BOC state. 
AND Page reloads without the PTBNL buttons after submission to BOC
AND Player history now has an Outright Trade entry in green font for this player on the date of the PTBNL
AND The action item is cleared from the club's clipboard
AND BOC can perform this action on behalf of clubs
AND Show blue success notification

title: As BOC, I want to reject a named player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the same preconditions as the previous test case
AND the receiving club has submitted the PTBNL to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC logs in and views the trade
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can hit the 'Reject' button on the Trade. This updates the PTBNL transaction status to "Rejected"
AND Reverse all Submit updates in story #129474671 for the PTBNL
AND Page reloads for BOC with updated button set as if the PTBNL was back in Preliminary
AND Initiating and approving club receives a rejection notification. The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees an updated button set  similar to preliminary which will allow them to delete the existing player and name a different player. 
AND Initiating club can resubmit the PTBNL to "Submit to Club" state or choose to simply delete the PTBNL (but not the actual consideration itself)
AND Remove transaction from approvals clipboard and from Player history
AND Show blue success notification "The transaction has been successfully rejected"

title: As a Club, I want player's Pending Org and roster status to get updated on submitting him as a named player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the preconditions in the previous test case are met
custom_steps: WHEN the PTBNL reaches Submitted to BOC
custom_expected: All AC in [574801](http://10.199.1.138/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/574801) and [574798](http://10.199.1.138/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/574798) should be met for the nominated player

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if I name a player who was active in the Majors since the Trade was agreed on
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is naming a player on a trade 
AND player was active in the major leauge between the original trade date and the date of the PTBNL
custom_steps: WHEN club submits the player
custom_expected: THEN they see an error "Player to be named cannot be active on a Major League roster between the trade date and the Date Named"

title: As Boc, I want to approve a named player post-trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND a club has submitted a PTBNL to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC views the clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN the PTBNL it appears on BOC clipboard for approval
AND Clicking on the approval item opens the Trade in view mode
AND BOC sees Approve and Reject buttons below the PTBNL
AND Approving the PTBNL moves this transaction status to approved and the page reloads without the buttons.
AND Run BOC on-submit rule checks before approval
AND global approval rule checks (cannot be approved while other transactions are pending, and cannot be dated before the latest approved transaction)
AND Once the PTBNL is approved, update player's current Org and roster status.
AND All clubs can now view the named player but can no longer see the original Alt cash section. BOC continues to see this section.
AND If player was on option, he must be recalled
AND Make an entry in the Daily Transaction bulletin if player is major league
AND Player history entry is now black font
AND Show blue success notification on approval

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if player requires waivers for being 10/5 or has a no-trade or limited trade clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is viewing a trade
AND that trade contains at least one player that requires consent for being a 10-5 man
AND that trade contains at least one player that requires consent for having a no-trade or limited trade clause
custom_steps: WHEN printing the Trades checklist
custom_expected: THEN the "10/5 and No Trade Clause"  checklist item is present

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if any cash amounts require prior BOC approval
custom_preconds:
WHEN the user is viewing a trade
AND there are cash amounts that require BOC approval
custom_steps: WHEN printing the Trades checklist
custom_expected: THEN the "Cash Considerations"  checklist item is present
